info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

post.description: This method creates one promotion stack. The sequence of promotion tier IDs will determine the promotion stacking order.

requestBody.description: Specify the order of promotion tiers for the promotion stack.

200.description: Returns a new stack object if a valid promotion campaign identifier was provided in the path and available promotion IDs in the payload.

404.description: Returns an error if the campaign or promotion tier cannot be found.

value.details: Cannot find campaign with id camp_99HUWI53bVyLzPN1Fg5TBLW
Cannot find promotion_tier with id promo_dJNhAEeV5sR5oPQq1UrUdnM

created_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the promotion stack was created. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

campaign_id.description: Promotion stack's parent campaign's unique ID.

object.description: The type of the object represented by JSON.

categories.description: Details about the category assigned to the promotion stack.

key.description: Short string describing the kind of error which occurred.

message.description: A human-readable message providing a short description of the error.

details.description: A human-readable message providing more details about the error.

request_id.description: This ID is useful when troubleshooting and/or finding the root cause of an error response by our support team.

resource_id.description: Unique resource ID that can be used in another endpoint to get more details.

error.description: Includes additional information about the error.

message.description: The message configured by the user in a validation rule.

tiers.description: Contains the tier configuration. A promotion stack can include up to 30 tiers.

ids.description: Contains the list of tiers in a pre-defined sequence.
